channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Intel: We Have The World’s Fastest Integrated GPU, And Here’s Proof
item.description: If Intel's latest claims prove accurate in real-world testing, Core Ultra Series 2 processors have the best built-in graphics performance in the world...

item.title: Default Alive: Survival Of The Fittest Female Founders
item.description: Female Founders bootstrapped startups are attractive targets for acquisitions. Acquisitions are the new tech IPO.

item.title: The conspiracy of mediocrity

item.title: NASA Solves Mystery Of Weird Sound From Starliner Spacecraft

item.title: Your audiobook

item.title: How To Keep Your Mobile App Fresh And Relevant For Users

item.title: Omitting the herbs

item.title: Spotter Joins AI Craze With New Creative Tool
item.description: YouTube catalog licensor Spotter announces a new subscription-based product Spotter Studio to help creators generate ideas and manage projects.

item.title: Language conceals and reveals
